name: Goblet's Dredges
desc:
When an enemy target enters battle, there is a #1[i]% base chance for it to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana.
Every time an enemy target receives DoT during a single attack by an ally, there is a #1[i]% base chance for the target to be inflicted with 1 stack of Arcana. The maximum number of stacks that can be inflicted during 1 single attack is #2[i].
